EmailTemplate.name: Dealer Bottle & Lowball
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thank you for reaching out and for your continued support of YETI and our Rambler drinkware line. We have big plans for exciting new products in this wildly successful series, and we look forward to sharing those plans with you soon.
As an approved YETI dealer, you are free to make these pricing changes in accordance with our MAP policy. All orders shipped 10/3/2016 and beyond will reflect this new wholesale pricing.
To submit for purchase credit click here (yet.com/rambler-form)
Should you have any additional questions about this change, please let us know
Thank you again for your support,
{!User.CommunityNickname} Account Management Team YETI 512.394.0222 sales@yeti.com yeti.com
